function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate or misleading data in the case flow information published by provincial health committees","Impact":"Difficulty in tracing the source of infection and identifying contacts, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Verification and validation of data sources, implementation of quality control measures for data accuracy","Technologies":"Data validation tools, automated data analysis tools","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, contact tracers","Owner":"Health departments, government agencies"},{"Description":"Misinformation or incomplete information in the character KG related to combating the epidemic","Impact":"Misinterpretation of individuals' roles and contributions in combating the epidemic, leading to misinformation and lack of recognition for key figures","Mitigation":"Verification of information, fact-checking, and cross-referencing with reliable sources","Technologies":"Natural language processing algorithms, knowledge graph validation tools","People":"Media, historians, researchers","Owner":"Knowledge graph administrators, historians, researchers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate or outdated hot event organization in the event KG","Impact":"Dissemination of incorrect information about epidemic-related events, leading to confusion and potential public health risks","Mitigation":"Regular updating and verification of event information, cross-referencing with official sources","Technologies":"Event management software, data validation algorithms","People":"General public, event organizers, public health officials","Owner":"Event organizers, public health departments"}]}
